website_summaries.verdict: Some may find this text-heavy book tedious to read, but Kaplan guides are known for their conciseness and use of real-life examples and helpful mnemonics – and this is the newest published guide.
pros: Uses multiple education methods to reinforce concepts
Explains both correct and incorrect answers
cons: Text-heavy, but some additional online resources
Material does not always match actual test questions

customer_reviews.title: Studying for the MCAT!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my books today! I’m so excited and I can’t wait to start reading them. I’m a junior in college and planning to take the MCAT in December or next summer, if I feel ready in 3 months I’ll take it if not I’ll wait until 2020 summer. I love the books they even have an online where you can take practice questions after you’re done reading each chapter.
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for review
customer_reviews.text: These books are excellent in the depth of knowledge they cover. Might go a little above and beyond whats required for the MCAT but that never hurts. I would recommend reading through the books quickly the first time around as a refresher. Then another time while also creating Anki cards, (look it up on youtube spaced repetition will absolutely change your life). After the second time of reading take some full-length practice tests and fill in the gaps where you are struggling. (use AAMC practice tests for best results) If you do these 3 things I promise you will be ahead of the competition. How bad do you want it?
customer_reviews.author: youCANdoIT

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Spent about 3 months reading all of these books, learned a ton, but got a 497. I wouldnt recommend them, but If you have like a year before your MCAT and you plan to do a ton of other types of prep then yeah they are good for that purpose only. I did lots of other prep including like all of the aamc practice material you can buy, and in retrospect, I probably would have done around the same had I just did that and not read these books. The only exception is the psych book that definitely helped my score.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITS AMAZING AND SOOO MUCH CHEAPER
customer_reviews.text: IT DOES COME WTH THE PRACTICE TEST. I know someone previously stated it didn't come with practice test but it does! You have to signup online the instructions are in the beginning of the book. I love this packet its so helpful and saved me so much money. I brought this along with the AAMC bundle. And it comes with a diagnostic test as well as additional practice material.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Would not refund or replace defective product
customer_reviews.text: This seller gave me a defective product and would not even be willing to return or refund the order. Also they did not even follow up with my request to simply change the book emailing back saying that “further mails regarding this order will not be answered”. All the pages in the other subjects books where fine, BUT the biology MCAT 2020-2021 review was missing a whole chapter. The pages skipped from the 10th chapter straight to the 12th chapter. Not only was this product defective but also when requesting a return or refund they refused to communicate.
customer_reviews.author: MCAT STUDYING

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived broken and beaten up. The top wasn't sealed properly. It literally wasn't even closed except for two pieces of tape across the wings (not the seams). Binding was cracked. Case was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Very comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: These books are great for comprehensive MCAT content review. It also includes questions at the end of each section and chapters to really help you solidify what you've learned/relearned. Although I needed to supplement the physics book with Exam Krackers for more practice questions and examples, I would recommend Kaplan for content review.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Great study prep for MCAT
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete set of MCAT prep material. Great explanations of the subject matter, covers everything you should need to know for the MCAT.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Mama

customer_reviews.title: Detailed
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed. Havent taken my exam yet but it's like literally doing the class
customer_reviews.author: Emmah

customer_reviews.title: Good practice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she already finished using it. Good practice for the MCAT.
customer_reviews.author: T Kong

customer_reviews.title: Efficient study tool
customer_reviews.text: Good use of study tool, has basic summaries and explanation of each topic in its individual book
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: So much medical stuff - who knew!
customer_reviews.text: My baby's gonna be a doctor! (freaking better be, I need new clubs . . .)
customer_reviews.author: Ski Bum

customer_reviews.title: Missing many pages
customer_reviews.text: Missing pages from 229 to 260 in Biology review. You can not return these books, because once you get to that missing pages, you already made lots of notes in the book. Maybe I will find more missing in the other books. Frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Jinn

customer_reviews.title: Practice questions are key
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love the Kaplan books better than others because of the quality and depth of information they have. I like the practice questions at the end of each section that help me practice and make sure I’m grasping the concepts.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: I guess I expected too much
customer_reviews.text: A lot of long unnecessary introductions, many equations are on the bottom of the page while the variables description - on the next page, CARS book is just the weirdest stuff I ever read in my life, the quality of paper is extremely low for such a big brand
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: 30 pages are missing
customer_reviews.text: 30 pages are missing in the book of Physics and Math Review... How can I get a new one?
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great book BUT missing chapter
customer_reviews.text: I love these books, it is very well written and easy to understand. Some people find it too detailed, but that is exactly what I like about it, as it promotes actual understanding. BUT: the entire chapter 11 of Biology (Musculoskeletal system) is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Taya

customer_reviews.title: MISSING CHAPTERS
customer_reviews.text: The Kaplan books are great except my bio book is, for some strange reason, missing an entire chapter. This is ridiculous and the books clearly need better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: John Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The books are very thorough with some colored pictures and other diagrams. The service was great, and the product was reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Dawn Carroll

customer_reviews.title: It's ALRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't like the separation of sections with the subjects. I wish each chapter was a different subject.
customer_reviews.author: Sirtaj Singh

customer_reviews.title: False Description
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Even though the product title says online and reviews, it does not include them. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Misunderstood deadline to return
customer_reviews.text: I do not need this item which i have not even opened but thought i had through today to return. Is there a way to do this....thank you for any help you can provide.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sooner than expected in great condition
customer_reviews.text: The books came back a day after ordering them instead of the three-five days that was listed. The books were also in great condition, no scratches or tears!
customer_reviews.author: deonna harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great books. Content is succinct and gears towards MCAT test.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: College Granddaughter Christmas Request
customer_reviews.text: She said this one was the best for her college...so that's what she gets! So proud of her!
customer_reviews.author: Donna K

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping/Good Quality/ Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Super fast. Got my books 3 days after I put the order. They look super new. Can’t wait to star studying.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Correa Meléndez

customer_reviews.title: Hope to have a medical student after study.
customer_reviews.text: She is going to be preparing to take the test next spring.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cook

customer_reviews.title: Missing a whole chapter in my biology textbook
customer_reviews.text: Overall all the books are great for content review, however in some of the books the ink is faint like it was on the verge of running out during the print. Additionally, my biology textbook is missing chapter 11 out of the book. Have not heard back from kaplan customer service in my 3rd attempt to resolve issue over the course of almost 2 months now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great (heavy) content review
customer_reviews.text: I loved these books for the MCAT (didn't use the practice tests though). I hadn't taken all of my pre-requisites and these books definitely filled all content gaps. Covers way more than the exam, and I think MCAT success should be focused on strategy, but I was so happy to have these to turn to for areas that needed study. The biochemistry book especially was amazing. Also the Kaplan flashcards were gold for the psychology section. I'd say those were my 2 favorite resources outside of official AAMC material. I scored above a 515 so hopefully this review is helpful - good luck everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Cut out last chapter of biochem and replaced it with physics.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t read the last high yield chapters of biochem because they misprinted it with the last chapter of physics.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: MCAT Complete 7-Book Subject Review 2020-2021: Online + Book + 3 Practice Tests (Kaplan Test Prep)
